title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
OB: When you export a directory (project) and place the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when you overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync issue.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Export a directory (project) as a jar file.
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
3. Overwrite the exported jar file.
4. Observe the out of sync message.
